uva-arena.title: UVA Arena
uva-arena.story: This software aims to provide a useful and informative tool to help users with their programming practice. Almost every features of uHunt has been included. Additionally, it has code editing, debugging and customizable problem list view options.

depression-detection-system.title: Depression Detection System
depression-detection-system.story: Many people suffer from depression in some period of their life. In most cases, depression is curable with proper medication in proper time. This site was built to increase awareness and encourage people for their mental health-care.

tuntuni.title: Tuntuni
tuntuni.story: Tuntuni is an application for peer to peer real time video conferencing and messaging within local network. It automatically discovers connected users withing same local networks. Provides a real time video conferencing, simple text messaging features with an attractive user interface.

angelnetbd.title: Bangladesh Angel Network
angelnetbd.story: An Angel Network is a network of investors who are interested in investing in startups and owning a part of its share. This is a platform to bring entrepreneurs and investors together.

images.caption: You can add your video, little descriptions etc

vaccine-for-child.title: Vaccine For Child
vaccine-for-child.story: This system was designed to notify parents about the vaccination schedule of their children. This uses Email or SMS notification to inform parents about the upcoming schedule.

images.caption: List of upcoming and past schedules
Add email or phone to get notification

course-feedback.title: Course Feedback
course-feedback.story: To improve the quality of the courses, active collaboration with the students is required. This is a platform to take a survey of a course. Not only the respective department, but the alumni, or the job industries can use this platform for system as well.

images.caption: Only department admin can see this
Department admin must verify the user
Only site admin can create question

alpr-bd.title: Automated Bangla License Plate Detection and Recognition
alpr-bd.story: License plate recognition is an active field of research in many countries. In Bangladesh, there have been many research but no decent implementation of the system. This is an open-source project that challenged the problems and hardships of Bangla ALPR, and tried to solved it.

lab-exam.title: Lab Exam Taker
story: Collecting codes from each students is a tedious work during programming lab exams. The target of this software is to solve this problem during Java Lab Exam. Additionally to avoid illegal acts of students, it runs in a kiosk like environment, that can not be closed unless the exam is finished. When students submit their problems with the client-side application, the codes are automatically stored in the server computer.

flash-copyer.title: Flash Copyer
flash-copyer.story: This is a hack-tool that automatically copies contents of inserted flash-storage without any notification.

process-scheduling.title: Process Scheduling
process-scheduling.story: A nice tool to visualize how different process scheduling algorithm works
